page.title: 01A day in my life
page.content: I wake up at half past six and go and see if my dad is awake.If he is awake I go and get dressed.I make my bed every morning.After I have made my bed I go and see what is happening downstairs.I put the television on to watch TVam.I lay the table and make a cup of coffee and tea.When my mum comes down she makes my breakfast.When I have finished I wash and brush my teeth.I plait my hair.I put my riding hat and boots on.I say goodbye to my mum and dad.I get my bike from the shed,collect the potato peelings and cycle off.I go across the pavement and down the lane to my friends place where I keep my pony for the summer.I go and see if Lisa is coming that is the girl who shares a field with me.We collect the ponies and bring them down and brush them.We put their tack on.We normally go for a ride on the lane.
